product.title: Robin Hood Spins Gold | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Robin Hood Spins Gold

The magic of Rapunzel unites with the nostalgia of Nottingham in this classic tale of greed, trickery, and good deeds. Robin Hood convinces evil Prince John that his daughter can spin straw into gold with a charmed spinning wheel and then sneaks the gold out of the Royal Counting House to give to the poor.

Tie-In Activity: Discuss the importance of giving to others with your child. Adopt a pet cause together, such as an animal shelter or food pantry, and contribute spare change to the fund.
